column5: Went to a couple CT stores today and two other fishing stores and heard they are now discontinued,hope they are wrong.Any one heard any different?
I believe I spelled it wrong?
or CTC discontinued them. Somewhere else will have them.
I have a handfull left from my store I can sell ya, send me an im if you want.

Great lures.  Super action.  The light of my life and I have been getting some great pike and bass action on them this summer. I have a bunch of them left over from my charter fishing days on the North Channel of Huron. Latest update on their website is less than a week ago so they're still around.
Email Colin at [emailÂ protected]  He is a great guy and can answer any questions you might have.
Grimsby Bait and Tackle has tons of them

Awesome steelhead and salmon lures!  Think someone mentioned on here earlier this year, that their local CTC store was selling them off at a ridiculously cheap price.  So could just be CTC.  Hope so, anyways. A great Canadian made product!!!
